amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete provisions that expand current law regarding the prosecution of 13-year-olds as adults and would have provided for the continuation of current law in this area.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the provisions of the bill that permit prosecution of 13-year-olds as adults.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 288 (Roll no. 113).
